law.catch_line: If a person files with the Comptroller a claim for return of the seized motor fuel or conveyances us...

text.section:
If a person files with the Comptroller a claim for return of the seized motor fuel or conveyances used in its transportation, the Comptroller shall:
provide an opportunity for a hearing; and
if requested by the claimant, conduct the hearing within 5 working days after the claim is received.

The Comptroller shall:
make a final determination of whether the property should be forfeited within 2 working days after the date of the conclusion of the hearing; and
mail a notice of the final determination on the date on which that determination is made.
